attributes.additional_details:
Stop plans to build a new housing estate on the Hogsback in Guildford. This means building 2000 new houses on land of:
1. Outstanding landscape value.
2. Outstanding natural beauty.
3. High value farmland.
It will create excess competition for school places, increase traffic congestion, put pressure on Guildfords services.
The government must stop development of our precious green spaces.
